name.value: HL7 Australia FHIR Working Group

description.value: This implementation guide is provided to support the use of FHIR®© in an Australian context.

copyright.value: HL7 Australia© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

name.value: Observation - Measurement of Hepatitis B surface antibody

description.value: Shows an example of a laboratory observation for the *AU Base Pathology Result* profile, demonstrating a final serology result for Hepatitis B surface antibody. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Specimen - Serum sample

description.value: Shows an example of a serum sample specimen for the *AU Base Specimen* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: ServiceRequest - for Hepatitis B surface antibody measurement

description.value: Shows an example of a completed request for Hepatitis B surface antibody measurement for the *AU Base Service Request* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: ServiceRequest - with multiple result copies to indicated

description.value: Shows an example of an active request for a full blood count for the *AU Base Service Request* profile, demonstrating multiple 'result copies to' entries. Patient: Harry Dan.

name.value: Condition - with evidence and onset date-time

description.value: Shows an example of a condition of Type 2 diabetes mellitus for the *AU Base Condition* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Coverage - DVA Gold Card

description.value: Shows an example of a coverage record for the *AU Base Coverage* profile, demonstrating a veteran health program under the Department of Veterans' Affairs. Beneficiary: Harry Dan.

name.value: Coverage - private health insurer

description.value: Shows an example of a private health insurance coverage record for the *AU Base Coverage* profile, demonstrating a plan under the payor HCF PTY LTD. Beneficiary: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Immunization - Non-administration of varicella-zoster live vaccine due to refusal

description.value: Shows an example of an immunisation record for the *AU Base Immunisation* profile, where the administration of the varicella-zoster live vaccine was not completed due to patient objection. Patient: Harry Dan.

name.value: Immunization - Administration of a vaccine - record compliant with Australian Immunisation Register (AIR)

description.value: Shows an example of a completed immunisation record for the *AU Base Immunisation* profile, demonstrating the administration of Infanrix-Hep B. The record is compliant with Australian Immunisation Register (AIR). Patient: Sally Grant.

name.value: Immunization - Administration of a vaccine with administering provider and protocol

description.value: Shows an example of a completed immunisation record for the *AU Base Immunisation* profile, demonstrating the administration of Infanrix Hexa. Patient: Sally Grant.

name.value: Immunization - Administration of Pfizer Comirnaty dose 1 for Sarah Simmons

description.value: Shows an example of a completed immunisation record for the *AU Base Immunisation* profile, demonstrating the administration of Pfizer Comirnaty for COVID-19. Patient: Sarah Simmons.

name.value: Practitioner - as a Radiologist

description.value: Shows an example of a Radiologist, Dr. Steve Smith, for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile, with an Ahpra Registration Number.

name.value: AllergyIntolerance - ibuprofen allergy

description.value: Shows an example of an Ibuprofen allergy with the reaction manifestation as urticaria for the *AU Base Allergy Intolerance* profile. Patient: Harry Dan.

name.value: AllergyIntolerance - self-reported allergy to eggs

description.value: Shows an example of an allergy to egg protein with reaction manifestations of hives, nausea, and vomiting for the *AU Base Allergy Intolerance* profile. Patient: Sally Grant.

name.value: AllergyIntolerance - self-reported intolerance to lactose

description.value: Shows an example of lactose intolerance with reaction manifestations of abdominal pain, abdominal bloating, and diarrhoea for the *AU Base Allergy Intolerance* profile. Patient: Suzanne Simmons.

name.value: AllergyIntolerance - no known allergy

description.value: Shows an example of an AllergyIntolerance resource indicating the patient has no known allergies for the *AU Base Allergy Intolerance* profile. Patient: John Smith.

name.value: BodyStructure - Bone tissue of left shoulder

description.value: Shows an example of a body structure resource for the *AU Base Body Structure* profile, representing bone tissue in the left shoulder region. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: BodyStructure - Blister of right foot

description.value: Shows an example of a body structure for the *AU Base Body Structure* profile, representing a blister on the right foot. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Device - as a registered repository service

description.value: Shows an example of a Device resource representing a registered repository service. The resource includes the PAI-D identifier, device name, type and owner identifier (PAI-O).

name.value: Location - of a Practitioner as a Radiologist

description.value: Shows an example of a Location resource for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Organization - a typical Organisation the Radiologist belongs to

description.value: Shows an example of an organisation, Albion Hospital, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with an ABN identifier, type as Private Hospital, and contact details including phone numbers and email addresses.

name.value: Organization - Holistic Medical Pty Ltd with ABN and HPI-O

description.value: Shows an example of an organisation, Holistic Medical Pty Ltd as trustee for Smith Family Trust, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with HPI-O and ABN identifiers, and contact details including a work email address and a physical address.

name.value: PractitionerRole - a typical Practitioner Role as a Radiologist

description.value: Shows an example of a Radiologist role for the *AU Base Practitioner Role* profile, including a National Provider Identifier at Organisation (NPIO) identifier, contact details, references to the associated Practitioner, Organization, Location, and HealthcareService, as well as availability exceptions for public holidays.

name.value: HealthcareService - a typical Healthcare Service the Radiologist belongs to

description.value: Shows an example of a radiology service, Albion Hospital Radiology Service, for the *AU Base Healthcare Service* profile.

name.value: Practitioner - a typical Practitioner as a General Practitioner

description.value: Shows an example of a practitioner, Dr. Francis Fernando, with a HPI-I and Ahpra Registration Number for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile.

name.value: Practitioner - a typical Ahpra registered professional

description.value: Shows an example of a practitioner, Dr. Robert Smith, with multiple identifiers (HPI-I and Ahpra Registration Number), qualifications and communication language for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile.

name.value: Practitioner - sex and gender

description.value: Shows an example of a practitioner for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile that demonstrates the adopted extensions for sex and gender.

name.value: Endpoint - a secure messaging endpoint example

description.value: Shows an example of a secure messaging endpoint using the Endpoint resource.

name.value: Location - of a Practitioner as a General Practitioner

description.value: Shows an example of a location, Family Medicine Clinic, at which the General Practitioner provides care for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Organization - a typical Organisation the General Practitioner belongs to

description.value: Shows an example of an organisation, Devonport Family Medicine Clinic, to which the General Practitioner belongs for the *AU Base Organisation* profile.

name.value: PractitionerRole - a typical Practitioner Role as a General Practitioner

description.value: Shows an example of a General Practitioner role for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile, including a Medicare Provider Number identifier, contact details, references to the associated Practitioner, Organization, Location, and HealthcareService, as well as availability on weekdays and unavailability on weekends.

name.value: HealthcareService - general practice

description.value: Shows an example of a healthcare service, General Practitioner services, for the *AU Base Healthcare Service* profile.

name.value: Patient - as transgender person with sex and gender

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Patricia Roth, for *AU Base Patient* profile that demonstrates the adopted extensions for sex and gender. This example is taken and adapted from the R5 Transgender Person Example.

name.value: Patient - with IHI, Medicare Card Number, patient internal identifier and the extension for Indigenous Status

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Stella Franklin, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The resource includes IHI, Medicare Card Number, and Health Card Number, patient internal identifer and the extension for Australian Indigenous Status and gender identity.

name.value: Patient - with IHI, DVA Number (with specific card colour) and the extension for Indigenous Status

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Harry Dan, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The resource includes IHI (expired) and DVA Gold Card Number, extension for Australian Veteran Status and Indigenous Status.

name.value: Patient - with no birth date, and is eligible for Closing the Gap registration

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Sally Grant, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The resource includes a Medicare Number, extensions for Australian Indigenous Status and Closing the Gap registration, with unknown date of birth.

name.value: Patient - with birth date and birth time

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, John Smith, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The resource includes a name, email contact, birth details (date and time with an extension for date accuracy), and residential address.

name.value: Patient - as a child born in 2008

description.value: Shows an example of a child patient, Suzanne Simmons, for the *AU Base Patient* profile.

name.value: Patient - as a mother for the patient in example 4

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Sarah Simmons, as the mother of Suzanne Simmons in example 4, for the *AU Base Patient* profile.

name.value: Patient - as a Culturally and linguistically diverse (CALD) patient 1

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, William Rigny, who requires an interpreter for healthcare communication, with their preferred communication language specified, for the *AU Base Patient* profile.

name.value: Patient - as a Culturally and linguistically diverse (CALD) patient 2

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Alejandro Hernández, born in Mexico and requiring an interpreter for healthcare communication, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The example also includes Alejandro's gender identity and their date of arrival in Australia.

name.value: Practitioner - with HPI-I and Prescriber Number

description.value: Shows an example of a practitioner, Dr. Helen Mayo, with multiple identifiers including HPI-I, Prescriber Number, Ahpra Registration Number, and Care Agency Employee Identifier, for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile.

name.value: PractitionerRole - with Provider Number and ANZSCO coded role

description.value: Shows an example of a Cardiologist role for the *AU Base Practitioner Role* profile, including a Medicare Provider Number identifier, specialty in Cardiology, contact details for work and after-hours purposes, and references to the associated Practitioner, Organization, and Location.

name.value: Organization - with HPI-O

description.value: Shows an example of an organisation, Downunder Hospital, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with a HPI-O, name, contact details, and address.

name.value: Organization - a Pathology organisation with NATA Number, ARBN, ABN, ACN, HPI-O and PAI-O

description.value: Shows an example of a pathology organisation, ACME Pathology, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with multiple identifiers such as HPI-O, NATA Accreditation Number, ABN, ACN, and PAI-O, and a reference to its parent organisation.

name.value: Organization - a Pathology organisation with HPI-O and is a parent organization

description.value: Shows an example of a parent pathology and diagnostic imaging organisation with a HPI-O identifier, Test Org - DigitalHealth 5, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile.

name.value: HealthcareService - with HPI-O with varied contact details

description.value: Shows an example of a cardiothoracic surgery healthcare service for the *AU Base Healthcare Service* profile, with a HPI-O, service name, specialty details, and multiple contact details.

name.value: Location - a hospital location with managing organisation of example0

description.value: Shows an example of a hospital location for the *AU Base Location* profile. The resource includes the location details and a reference to the managing organisation, Downunder Hospital.

name.value: Patient - with Birth Date Accuracy Indicator of AAA

description.value: Shows an example of a patient for the *AU Base Patient* profile with Date Accuracy Indicator extension Accurate Year, Accurate Month and Accurate Date.

name.value: Patient - with Birth Date Accuracy Indicator of AAU

description.value: Shows an example of a patient for the *AU Base Patient* profile with Date Accuracy Indicator extension Accurate Year, Accurate Month and Unknown Date

name.value: Patient - with Birth Date Accuracy Indicator of UAA

description.value: Shows an example of a patient for the *AU Base Patient* profile with Date Accuracy Indicator extension Unknown Year, Accurate Month and Accurate Date.

name.value: Patient - with Birth Date Accuracy Indicator of UEA

description.value: Shows an example of a patient for the *AU Base Patient* profile with Date Accuracy Indicator extension Unknown Year, Estimated Month and Accurate Date.

name.value: Patient - with Birth Date Accuracy Indicator of UUU

description.value: Shows an example of a patient for the *AU Base Patient* profile with Date Accuracy Indicator extension Unknown Year, Unknown Month and Unknown Date.

name.value: Location - of a Practitioner as a Pathologist

description.value: Shows an example of a location at a specific level within a hospital for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Location - for services delivered by phone, video or online

description.value: Shows an example of a virtual telehealth service location for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Location - for mobile services that can be delivered in a person's house, apartment, or unit

description.value: Shows an example of a mobile, home-based service location for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Location - for mobile services that can be delivered in schools

description.value: Shows an example of a mobile, school-based service location for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: Location - for mobile services that can be delivered in residential care facilities

description.value: Shows an example of a mobile, residential-care-based service location for the *AU Base Location* profile.

name.value: PractitionerRole - as a Pathologist

description.value: Shows an example of a General pathologist role for the *AU Base Practitioner Role* profile, including an Employee Number identifier, specialty in General Pathology, contact details, references to the associated Practitioner, Organization, Location, and HealthcareService, as well as availability times.

name.value: HealthcareService - of a Pathologist

description.value: Shows an example of a pathology service, Albion Hospital Pathology Service, for the *AU Base Healthcare Service* profile.

name.value: Practitioner - as a Pathologist

description.value: Shows an example of a Pathologist, Dr. Peter Winslow, for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile, with an Ahpra Registration Number.

name.value: PractitionerRole - with assigning authority

description.value: Shows an example of a Cardiologist role for the *AU Base Practitioner Role* profile, including identifiers for Medicare Provider Number and Vendor Directory, an active status, contact details, references to the associated Practitioner, Organization, Location, and an Endpoint for secure messaging.

name.value: Organization - a hospital with an HPIO

description.value: Shows an example of a hospital organisation, Downunder Hospital, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with a HPI-O.

name.value: RelatedPerson - as attester party

description.value: Shows an example of a related person, Benedicte du Marche, who is the next-of-kin for Stella Franklin, for the *AU Base Related Person* profile.

name.value: RelatedPerson - as a carer for an older patient

description.value: Shows an example of a related person, Mary Smith, who is a caregiver for Harry Dan, for the *AU Base Related Person* profile.

name.value: RelatedPerson - as a mother for the patient in example 4

description.value: Shows an example of a related person, Sarah Simmons, who is the mother of Suzanne Simmons, for the *AU Base Related Person* profile.

name.value: RelatedPerson - as father

description.value: Shows an example of a related person, Bill Simmons, who is the father of Alejandro Hernández, for the *AU Base Related Person* profile.

name.value: RelatedPerson - as family member with sex and gender

description.value: Shows an example of a related person, Alex Baker, for the *AU Base Related Person* profile, demonstrating the adopted extensions for sex and gender.

name.value: Patient - male born in 1949 with address and contact details

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, Nicholas Jones, for the *AU Base Patient* profile. The resource includes an IHI, Australian Indigenous Status extension, and contact details and address.

name.value: Observation - of no relevant finding of procedure

description.value: Shows an example of an observation asserting no history of procedure for the *AU Assertion of No Relevant Finding* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Observation - of no relevant finding of immunisations

description.value: Shows an example of an observation asserting no history of immunisation for the *AU Assertion of No Relevant Finding* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Observation - of no relevant finding of known history of conditions

description.value: Shows an example of an observation asserting no known history of conditions for the *AU Assertion of No Relevant Finding* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Observation - of no relevant finding of patient taking any medications

description.value: Shows an example of an observation asserting that the patient is not taking any medications for the *AU Assertion of No Relevant Finding* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Observation - active participation in 12 step alcohol program

description.value: Shows an example of a health program participation observation for the *AU Health Program Participation Summary* profile. Patient: Suzanne Simmons.

name.value: Observation - deferred BreastScreen Australia screening due to travel

description.value: Shows an example of a deferred cancer screening program participation observation for the *AU Health Program Participation Summary* profile. Patient: Sarah Simmons.

name.value: Patient - structured Australian Address

description.value: Shows an example of a patient with structured work addresses, including a postal address and a physical address, for the *AU Base Patient* profile.

name.value: Patient - unstructured Australian Address

description.value: Shows an example of a patient with an unstructured physical address for the *AU Base Patient* profile.

name.value: Patient - Australian No Fixed Address

description.value: Shows an example of an anonymous patient with no fixed address for the *AU Base Patient* profile, indicating a temporary address.

name.value: Patient - Australian address with identifiers

description.value: Shows an example of a patient address for the *AU Base Patient* profile, with with identifiers

name.value: Patient - indicate IHI validation name context

description.value: Shows an example of a patient, May Chan, for the *AU Base Patient* profile, with IHI validation name context indication.

name.value: Practitioner - indicate HPI-I validation name context

description.value: Shows an example of a practitioner for the *AU Base Practitioner* profile, with HPI-I validation name context indication

name.value: Medication - dose based

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Fluconazole-containing product, injection, 200 mg/100 mL, defined by dose, form, and strength for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Unbranded Product of clarithromycin 500mg tablet

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Clarithromycin 500mg tablet, defined by dose, form, and strength for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Unbranded Product of esomeprazole 20mg tablet

description.value: Shows an example of an unbranded product, Esomeprazole 20mg tablet, defined by dose, form, and strength for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Unbranded product of amoxicillin 500mg capsule

description.value: Shows an example of an unbranded product, Amoxicillin 500mg capsule, defined by dose, form, and strength for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - uncoded medicinal product information

description.value: Shows an example of a medication with uncoded medicinal product information, Crestor (Rosuvastatin) 20mg tablet in a 30-pack, defined by its brand and generic names, manufacturer, dose, form, and strength for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - branded pack

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Nexium Hp7 (14 x Nexium tablets, 28 x Amoxil capsules, 14 x Klacid tablets) in a single pack, defined by its branded and unbranded package information, manufacturer, and form for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Generic Pack of paracetamol 500mg (100)

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Paracetamol 500 mg tablet (100 tablets per pack), defined by its generic packaging, form, and coding for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Branded Pack of Nexium HP7 20;500;500

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Nexium HP7 (14 esomeprazole 20 mg tablets, 28 amoxicillin 500 mg capsules, 14 clarithromycin 500 mg tablets, 1 pack), defined by its branded packaging, manufacturer, and form for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Branded Pack With Single Active Ingredient

description.value: Shows an example of a medication, Chlorsig (chloramphenicol 0.5%, eye drops), defined by its branded product, single active ingredient, strength, and form for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - with two active ingredients product

description.value: Shows an example of a medication with two active ingredients, perindopril arginine (10 mg) and amlodipine (10 mg), defined as a tablet for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - with four or more active ingredients

description.value: Shows an example of a branded medication, Stribild, containing four active ingredients and defined as a tablet for the *AU Base Medication* profile.

name.value: Medication - Branded Pack with Batch Details

description.value: Shows an example of a branded medication, Norvasc, containing the active ingredient amlodipine (10 mg) as a tablet, with batch details including lot number and expiration date, for the *AU Base Medication* profile

name.value: Composition - with multiple information recipients

description.value: Shows an example of a composition with multiple information recipients for the *AU Base Composition* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: ​Composition - with some sections having a different section author to the composition author

description.value: Shows an example of a composition with sections authored by different individuals for the *AU Base Composition* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Composition - Patient’s preference upon death

description.value: Shows an example of a composition representing patient goals, preferences, and priorities upon death, including a related person as the author and attester, for the *AU Base Composition* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationStatement - of a record of a patient's use of medication

description.value: Shows an example of a medication statement for the *AU Base Medication Statement* profile, representing a patient's active use of a branded medication with specific timing and dosage details. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationStatement - of a record of a patient's long-term use of medication

description.value: Shows an example of a medication statement for the *AU Base Medication Statement* profile, including informative record of a patient's long-term use of medication. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationStatement - Practitioner reports patient has taken Diflucan in the past but is not taking it any more

description.value: Shows an example of a medication statement for the *AU Base Medication Statement* profile, representing a practitioner reporting that the patient has taken Diflucan in the past but is not taking it anymore. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationRequest - a prescription for codeine with paracetamol

description.value: Shows an example of a medication request for the *AU Base Medication Request* profile, representing a practitioner's order for a patient to take paracetamol 500 mg + codeine phosphate hemihydrate 30 mg tablets for pain management. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationRequest - a prescription for Stribild tablet

description.value: Shows an example of a medication request for the *AU Base Medication Request* profile, representing a practitioner's order for a patient to take Stribild daily for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, with all repeats supplied concurrently for overseas travel. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: MedicationRequest - Prescription with brand and generic name extensions

description.value: Shows an example of a medication request for the *AU Base Medication Request* profile, representing a practitioner's order for the patient to take Reaptan for pain management, with detailed dosage instructions and dispensing information. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Encounter - with description

description.value: Shows an example of an encounter with an encounter description for the *AU Base Encounter* profile.

name.value: Encounter - Annual check up

description.value: Shows an example of an encounter for the *AU Base Encounter* profile, representing an annual check up encounter for [Observation-healthprogramparticipation-example0](https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/Observation-healthprogramparticipation-example0.html). Patient: Suzanne Simmons.

name.value: List - Medicine list with referenced entries

description.value: Shows an example of a medication list for the *AU Medicine List* profile, representing a snapshot of a patient's current medications. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: List - Medicine list with no known current medicine

description.value: Shows an example of a medication list with no current medications for the *AU Medicine List* profile. Patient: Stella Franklin.

name.value: Bundle - Medicine list in a bundle

description.value: Shows an example of a FHIR Bundle containing resources related to the *AU Medicine List* profile. Patient: Nicholas Jones.

name.value: List - Medicine list with changes

description.value: Shows an example of a medication list for the *AU Medicine List* profile, representing a snapshot of a patient's current, amended, and ceased medications. Patient: David Goodpatient.

name.value: List - Medicine list authored by a related person

description.value: Shows an example of a medication list authored by a related person for the *AU Medicine List* profile. Patient: Suzanne Simmons

name.value: MedicationDispense - First dispense for Reaptan

description.value: Shows an example of a medication dispense for the *AU Base Medication Dispense* profile, representing the first dispensing of Reaptan 10 mg/10 mg (perindopril arginine/amlodipine) tablets. Patient: Stella Franklin.

description.value: Shows an example of a location for the *AU Base Location* profile, representing a nursing home 'Honourable Mark's Home For Aged Men' as a location.

description.value: Shows an example of a medication dispense for the *AU Base Medication Dispense* profile, representing the second dispensing of Reaptan 10 mg/10 mg (perindopril arginine/amlodipine) tablets. Patient: Stella Franklin.

description.value: Shows an example of a religuous institution, The Corporation of the Synod of the Diocese of Nundah, for the *AU Base Organisation* profile, with an ABN, address and contact details.

description.value: Shows an example for a body substance of epiglottic mucus for the AU Base Substance profile.

description.value: Shows an example for an allergen substance of peanuts for the *AU Base Substance* profile.

description.value: Shows an example for a medication substance with two active ingredients for the *AU Base Substance* profile.

name.value: MedicationAdministration - Administration of Chlorsig eye drops

description.value: Shows an example of administration of Chlorsig to a patient for the *AU Base Medication Administration* profile, administered by a related person. Patient: Harry Dan.

name.value: MedicationAdministration - Self-administration of lantus 100 units/mL injection

description.value: Shows an example of a medication administration that is a self-administration of lantus 100 units/mL injection for the *AU Base Medication Administration* profile. Patient: Sarah Simmons.

name.value: Procedure - Cryotherapy

description.value: Shows an example of a completed cryotherapy procedure for the *AU Base Procedure* profile. Patient: William Rigny.
